env.name: LOG_LEVEL
env.description: Set log level to output for plugin logs

env.name: SPLUNK_LOGGING_DRIVER_FIFO_ERROR_RETRY_TIME
env.description: Set number of retry when reading fifo from docker failed. -1 means retry forever

env.name: SPLUNK_LOGGING_DRIVER_POST_MESSAGES_FREQUENCY
env.description: Set how often do we send messages (if we are not reaching batch size)

env.name: SPLUNK_LOGGING_DRIVER_POST_MESSAGES_BATCH_SIZE
env.description: Set number of messages to batch before buffer timeout

env.name: SPLUNK_LOGGING_DRIVER_BUFFER_MAX
env.description: Set maximum number of messages wait in the buffer before sent to Splunk

env.name: SPLUNK_LOGGING_DRIVER_CHANNEL_SIZE
env.description: Set number of messages allowed to be queued in the channel when reading from the docker provided FIFO

env.name: SPLUNK_LOGGING_DRIVER_TEMP_MESSAGES_HOLD_DURATION
env.description: Used when logs that are chunked by docker with 16kb limit. Set how long the system can wait for the next message to come.

env.name: SPLUNK_LOGGING_DRIVER_TEMP_MESSAGES_BUFFER_SIZE
env.description: Used when logs that are chunked by docker with 16kb limit. Set the biggest message that the system can reassemble.
